name: Telnet Sv Telesign
title: Java SE
summary: Telnet Sv Telesign is an java SE program implementation by javax.swing, The goal of this program was manage alarm system on telecommunication equipment with telnet protocol.
explain:
Telnet Sv Telesign is an java SE program implementation by javax.swing, The goal of this program was manage alarm system on telecommunication equipment with telnet protocol.

this program have ability create multi session to connect equipment with multithreading architecture, also use of structured programming (modular programming) for best performance.

Project features :

- Manage station on custom map

- Manage users (multi permission)

- Manage alarm system and type

- Communicate with device by telnet

- Communicate with MYSQL

- Custom log and save to file

This program currently used in mazandaran telecommunication company.
